UnsupportedGU - exception project.ss.exception.UnsupportedGU.
This class extends the GSSException class and is thrown when an unrecognized character(s) is faced where only Gujarati Unicode character(s) is expected.

UnsupportedIPA - exception project.ss.exception.UnsupportedIPA.
This class extends the GSSException class and is thrown when an unrecognized char(s) is faced where only IPA Unicode char(s) is expected.
